document.full_text: dave bolland returned to the chicago lineup after missing 17 games with a concussion and had a goal and three assists as the blackhawks avoided being swept by the vancouver canucks.
document.title: blackhawks 7, canucks 2: with outburst, defending champions stay alive
lines_and_colors: dave bolland returned to the chicago lineup after missing 17 games with a concussion and had a goal and three assists as the blackhawks avoided being swept by the vancouver canucks.
